text: Wyn Calvin MBE OStJ (born Joseph Wyndham Calvin-Thomas; 28 August 1925 – 25 January 2022) was a Welsh comedian, actor, radio personality, television host, lecturer, philanthropist and newspaper columnist.The incredibly colourful life of the Welshman celebrating 75 years in showbiz - Wales Online As a comedy performer, he appeared in variety theatres around the country including summer shows (seven in Llandudno and four in Blackpool. He was known as "Blackpool's favourite Welsh comedian. He was well known for pantomime. Calvin died on 25 January 2022, at the age of 96. Paul Evans, "A life dedicated to show- business: Narberth born entertainer Wyn Calvin passes away", Pembroke Observer, 25 January 2022 .
